name: Pliers and Screwdriver
description: Pliers are made in various shapes and sizes and for many uses. Some are used for gripping something round like a pipe or rod, some are used for twisting wires, and others are designed to be used for a combination of tasks including cutting wire.

name: Wrench
description: Wrenches are made in various shapes and sizes and are used for gripping, fastening, turning, tightening and loosening things like pipes, pipe fittings, nuts and bolts.

name: Screwdrivers-Screws
description: These tools are designed to fit screws with Phillips heads, which have a cross-shaped recess - hence the alternative name of cross screwdriver. They were invented to cope with higher torsion.

name: Hammer
description: Hammers are used for general carpentry, framing, nail pulling, cabinet making, assembling furniture, upholstering, finishing, riveting, bending or shaping metal, striking masonry drill and steel chisels, and so on. Hammers are designed according to the intended purpose.

name: Pliers
description: Pliers are made in various shapes and sizes and for many uses. Some are used for gripping something round like a pipe or rod, some are used for twisting wires, and others are designed to be used for a combination of tasks including cutting wire.

name: Cog wheels gear
description: A gear is a rotating circular machine part having cut teeth or, in the case of a cogwheel or gearwheel, inserted teeth (called cogs), which mesh with another (compatible) toothed part to transmit (convert) torque and speed.

name: Drill Screwdriver
description: When choosing a drill for driving screws, choose a cordless drill that has high and low or variable speeds and an adjustable clutch. An impact driver is the best choice for longer screws, since it combines increased torque with a hammering action to get the job done easier.

name: Saw for wood
description: A saw is a tool consisting of a tough blade, wire, or chain with a hard toothed edge. It is used to cut through material, very often wood, though sometimes metal or stone. The cut is made by placing the toothed edge against the materia.

name: Screwdrivers Collection
description: These (screw) tools are designed to fit screws with Phillips heads, which have a cross-shaped recess - hence the alternative name of cross screwdriver. They were invented to cope with higher torsion.

name: Cog wheels gear
description: A gear is a rotating circular machine part having cut teeth or, in the case of a cogwheel or gearwheel, inserted teeth (called cogs), which mesh with another (compatible) toothed part to transmit (convert) torque and speed.

name: Hammer Saw Shovel
description: Shovel is a tool used to dig as well as to move loose, granular materials (like dirt, gravel, grain, or snow) from one spot to another. Spade is a tool used for digging straight-edged holes or trenches, slicing and lifting sod, and edging flower beds or lawns.

name: Wrench sleeve removal
description: This tool was designed for installing and removing lockouts from taps and splitters. However, it is even more useful for breaking loose tight connectors.

name: Roofing Nails Nail
description: For best performance, you should use ring roofing nails that are made of hot‚Äêdipped galvanized steel. You should use 12-gauge or thicker. The length of nail you use depends on the thickness of the sheathing and shingles you use.

name: Bolt
description: The bolt is a solid cylindrical fastener that is used with a nut. The nuts are hollow circular cylinders with a circular cross-section. The bolts are solid cylinders with a circular cross-section. They are used as a fastener in conjugation with bolts.

name: Chainsaw
description: A chainsaw is a power tool that can quickly cut through tree trunks and branches. If a tree falls during a storm, blocking your driveway, you can cut it into pieces with a chainsaw.

name: Trowel Garden Tool
description: Garden trowels are used for digging small holes, such for planting bulbs, annuals or perennials. It would take a lot of time and effort to dig a hole for a tree or shrub with a garden trowel. Garden trowels are also used to dig up weeds.

name: Wrench Removal
description: They're an essential tool to have in your toolbox and are used to tighten and loosen nuts, bolts, screws, and pipes. Below we'll take a look at the most common kinds of wrenches and how to use them.

name: Handsaw Tool (Electric)
description: In woodworking and carpentry, hand saws, also known as 'panel saws', are used to cut pieces of wood into different shapes. This is usually done in order to join the pieces together and carve a wooden object.

name: Woodworking Carpentry Chisel
description: Here our collection is pretty good. You can get with this collection, two handsaw, two srewdriver, and a big table for containing your work place. It should remove your pain to work smoothly. Now You can find in Our stock. Hurry up for order!

name: Wingnut Tool
description: Steel wing nut driver is a tool that works with any power drill. It is designed to fit over wing nut wings to enable you to tighten or loosen wing nuts quickly when installing hurricane panels.

name: Split Washers
description: Also known as a split washer, a lock washer is a special type of washer that's designed to create tension so that the bolt doesn't loosen or otherwise come out of its installed position. Lock washers aren't flat.

name: Secateurs Garden
description: Secateurs are a gardening tool that look like a pair of strong, heavy scissors. Secateurs are used for cutting the stems of plants.

name: Nails Flat Head
description: Flat Head Nails are used within framing, boxing, crates, pallets, fencing, and general timber fixing applications. Made from hardened nail wire with a bright polished finish, cold forged, with a reinforced flat head with plain shank and diamond point.

name: Wrench Tools Repair
description: Wrenches are made in various shapes and sizes and are used for gripping, fastening, turning, tightening and loosening things like pipes, pipe fittings, nuts and bolts.

description: In this all in toolbox contains all the tool which is you mostly needed and you can find your every tool here. Som this quietly big amount for pricing, but we compromise for you, that you can buy and use our product.
